attributes.action: to resign with immediate effect having no mandate or moral authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Failures:BANKING SUPERVISION. BANKING CRISIS. NEGLIGENCE. LACK OF JUDGEMENT. UNEMPLOYMENT. PUBLIC SPENDING. PUBLIC SECTOR JOBS-20.4% of all employed. GROWTH-LOWER than any other English speaking country.GOLD SALES-sold 60% of gold at a 20year low. ANTI-POVERTY-poor accounted for 6.8% taxes, now 6.9%-benefits for group dropped from 28.1 to 27.1%.TAX-tax risen from 39.3 to 42.4%. Abolished 10% tax leading to an INCREASE for 5million lowest earners. PENSIONS-tax changes=demise of most final salary pensions damageing every person. FALSEHOODS-misuse of data over Spence affair when Chancellor said " nearly every fact he used was false".IRAQ-supported illegal war causing the deaths of many service personnel, used false intelligence, increased threat to UK from terrorist attack. MILITARY COVENANT-ignored this, lower Service's morale, failed to equip our forces or provide healthcare to the injured.VAT RATE-a failure.QUOTES-"no one should benefit from failure", "No more boom and bust", "UK is in a better position than any other country".SURVEILLANCE SOCIETY-passed oppressive laws.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
